name: Loblaw Pharmacy
address: Loblaw Pharmacy, 3185 Grandview Hwy, Vancouver, BC V5M 2E9

featured_reviews.review_id: Un caring about the health of those filling prescriptions here, and not sure how capable the pharmacist is if they don't know what they're providing.  Refused to put items through insurance claiming they did not have a prescription. This was parts of a larger order and when asked, from the Dr. Providing the prescription, they indicated it was obvious the patient had enough information on the original prescription to process such a request and that they never heard of itemizing a prescription in this manner.  Wanted to send a vulnerable individual to walk in clinics to wait with other sick people for hours when pharmacies can prescribe themselves for clear low level issues such as this.  Also filled the rest of the prescription with other drugs know and clearly indicated to treat same issue.  Either, they do not give any care to the overall health of a person, or they don't know what they're prescribed drugs do.  Went somewhere else and was able to easily get this corrected.

featured_reviews.review_id: What is the point of my doctor calling in HOURS ahead of time for my prescription for them to tell me to come back in TWO DAYS?!?! Are you kidding me???? It's ridiculous. I'm in pain and I need my prescription immediately and you haven't been able to fill the prescription within 5 flipping hours??? Is that a joke?! Who is running this place???
featured_reviews.review_text: What is the point of my doctor calling in HOURS ahead of time for my prescription for them to tell me to come back in TWO DAYS?!?! Are you kidding me???? It's ridiculous. I'm in pain and I need my prescription immediately and you haven't been able to fill the prescription within 5 flipping hours??? Is that a joke?! Who is running this place???

featured_reviews.review_id:
Superstore is my shopping store. Each store is very different.
the superstoer on grandview is clean and tidy.  Staff greeting you or saying have a good day is very rare.  the  self check out is where i rely on staff saying thankyou and have a good day. i get nothing and there are times there are2 people talking and not even paying attention to customers.   Cashiers are more friendlier  than any other staff i see working.
if saying hi and have a good day is too painful for you than quit your job and stay home

featured_reviews.review_id: Never answer the phone, don't go this pharmacy. It took 2 days for picking up my medicine. They insisted they didn't get my prescription. And next day, they prepared.
featured_reviews.review_text: Never answer the phone, don't go this pharmacy. It took 2 days for picking up my medicine. They insisted they didn't get my prescription. And next day, they prepared.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I've been on the phone for 15 minutes now trying to get through to the pharmacy for my prescription. It's just ringing and ringing. This is the second time I've called and the same thing happened last time until finally someone answered. Also trying to pickup a prescription is a nightmare as they always take 45+ minutes. So incredibly slow. I'll be switching my prescription to a different pharmacy. I have no tolerance  for  horrendous service.

Avoid this pharmacy at all costs. Absolutely horrible.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
I have same prescription for over 3 years and there was no single time without an issue when I came to pick it up.
The worst customer service I ever experienced especially from the older lady with long gray hair. She was very rude and unprofessional. One time she gave me my usual prescription in a half size smaller box and charging me full price. I tried to explain her that this is not correct and she wasn't even able to listen to me. I went home garbed my old box with my old receipt and went back to prove it. She wasn't there and someone else who helped me found out that second half of my prescription was forgotten to give me. If she was able to listen this would never happen.
Most common issue I have when I come to pick it up, it is not ready even though I gave them few extra days. When I come they act like I have ever placed the order and they don't have it in record and they have to order something and start over. If it happened once, OK but it happens every time for over 3 years. How is that even possible?
When I told her what had happen to me last time, he kept saying NO, like she could change what already happened and is not able to listen at all.
Yes people have bad days but I think she hates her job and her life.
I am changing the pharmacy because this service is not going  to change.
If her boss was her customer she would be fired in a minute.
There are overall issues with the logistics of the pharmacy but her attitude is makes everything even worst.

featured_reviews.review_id: I call, and call, and call at different times of the day. No one answers the phone... Then you forced to go to the pharmacy and no one wants to help you. This is every time I come here. Bad service
featured_reviews.review_text: I call, and call, and call at different times of the day. No one answers the phone... Then you forced to go to the pharmacy and no one wants to help you. This is every time I come here. Bad service

featured_reviews.review_id: Absolutely horrendous service. They're extremely slow and downright unhelpful. The pharmacist was answering a phone call while making me wait even though I'd already waited 40+ mins. I'd give them a zero if I could.
featured_reviews.review_text: Absolutely horrendous service. They're extremely slow and downright unhelpful. The pharmacist was answering a phone call while making me wait even though I'd already waited 40+ mins. I'd give them a zero if I could.
